# .github

APPSTORE. GitHub IS the App Store.

## Components

- **workflows/** - VaaS validators (GitHub Actions)
- **CANON.md** - APPSTORE governance
- **VOCAB.md** - APPSTORE vocabulary
- **CANONIC-MANUAL.md** - Full reference
- **ONBOARDING.md** - Team guide

## Zero Infrastructure

```
GitHub Actions  = VaaS (validation)
GitHub Marketplace = Billing
GitHub Badges   = Certification
GitHub Topics   = Discovery
```

We build validators. GitHub does the rest.
